function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Rapid manufacturing of portable isolation units using 3-d printing technology","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of drones for monitoring compliance with social distancing measures and detecting potentially infected individuals","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruptions in supply chains due to travel restrictions and lack of key workers","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High-risk face-to-face encounters due to supply chain disruptions","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ai-enabled technology dependency for diagnosis may lead to misdiagnosis or missed diagnoses due to technological errors or limitations","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Shortage of medical staff due to increased demand for services","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of necessary resources such as ventilators, intensive care units, and protective equipment","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on smart robots for healthcare tasks","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of facial recognition technology to verify compliance with self-quarantine rules","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deployment of smart devices and robots equipped with uvc radiation for cleaning and disinfection","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on ai-based technologies for early detection and monitoring","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smart technologies for mass surveillance and enforcement of pandemic protocols","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Automatic detection of people using computer vision may lead to privacy concerns and surveillance issues","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Analysis of travel card data may pose risks to individual privacy and data security","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Relying solely on wearable sensors and smart solutions for large-scale detection of cases may result in inaccurate or incomplete data","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence on centralized cloud platforms for reporting health information may pose privacy and security risks","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on smart solutions for hotspot identification may lead to neglect of other critical factors contributing to disease spread","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collection of personal data through face scanners and iot devices raises privacy concerns and potential misuse of data","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on machine learning and ai models for disease prediction may lead to inaccuracies and false predictions","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential security incidents due to data exchange","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmented management in public health emergency systems","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Cities not well prepared for prevailing viruses despite having smart infrastructure","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timely implementation of border control and closure of land and sea borders","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repurposing urban command and control centers for surveillance and tracing of infected individuals","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Repurposing integrated command and control centers as covid-19 war rooms","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited pre-event preparations for disease outbreaks","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of investment in smart city infrastructure","category":"City/Metropolis","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Simultaneous data collection and analysis may lead to data contamination and bias in interpretation","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness for subsequent waves of the pandemic","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for absorption of immediate aftermath of the pandemic","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of early and effective management of health emergency in hospitals","category":"Healthcare","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dengue importation driven by international air traffic","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in intercepting pathogen introduction through air traffic","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Threat of vector-borne diseases to global public health","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importation of dengue from dengue-affected areas through air travel","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seasonal variation in the rate of imported dengue cases","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of aedes mosquitoes in europe","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Historical local transmission events","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High risk values for wnv infection in specific regions","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dengue dispersal through air traffic","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Elevated temperature accelerating viral replication and transmission of wnv","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Link between heat waves and wnf outbreaks in europe","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Correlation between temperature deviations and wnf cases","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suitable environmental conditions for malaria transmission, including warmer temperatures, low elevation, and intensive agriculture","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Biological and environmental drivers of west nile virus wnv transmission, including bird and vector population densities","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuing transmission of p. vivax by indigenous vectors in areas with permissive environmental and climatic conditions","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Importation of vector-borne diseases","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Autochthonous transmission of malaria","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continued importation of malaria cases","category":"Mobility Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Geographic shift in infectious diseases leading to expansion of disease burden into new areas","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"}]}
